short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track stats and get notified instantly when you mine a new block or get paid on 2Miners

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
2Miners Assistant offers powerful automated tools to save time and valuable analytics to control the mining operation.

No registration is required, everything is free forever. You can start receiving live updates of your mining stats and rewards by adding your wallet public key in the popup menu.
